meanings.definition: To revise or update existing laws or regulations.
meanings.sent1: The government recodifies the traffic laws to make them clearer for everyone.
meanings.sent2: She recodifies the company policies every year to ensure they are up to date.
meanings.sent3: The mayor recodifies the parking regulations, causing confusion among drivers.
meanings.sent4: The teacher recodifies the classroom rules, turning chaos into order.
meanings.sent5: Recodifying the tax code simplifies the process for taxpayers.

meanings.sent5: The committee recodifies the bylaws, ensuring clarity for all members.
